case_title: MERCANTILE TOBACCO CORPORATION vs COMMISSIONER OF INCOME-TAX

key_arguments.petitioner: The appeal dismissed by the Tribunal as time-barred does not constitute an appeal in the eye of law, and the Commissioner should have entertained the revision.
key_arguments.respondent: The appeal was admitted and dismissed as time-barred, making the Appellate Assistant Commissioner's order the subject of appeal, precluding revision under Section 33A(2).

precedents_cited.case_name: Mela Ram & Sons v. Commissioner of Income-tax
